allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve accuracy to 70% and add ACL workshop roadmap

Code improvements:
- Fix reduplication handling: phonetic 0%→77.78%, partial 11%→55.56%
- Change reduplication format from rs\(~variant\) to ulg~variant
- Add frozen compound handling \(ramah-tamah, gotong-royong\)
- Fix dwipurwa detection for lelaki, leluhur, tetua
- Update reconstructor for new format

Paper updates:
- Update accuracy from 66.94% to 70.00%
- Update BPE alignment to 41.7% \(real SentencePiece\)
- Reframe Research Questions to realistic scope
- Update contributions and abstract

Documentation:
- Create NEXT_STEPS.md with detailed implementation guide
- Update PAPER_WRITING_ROADMAP.md for ACL workshop target
- Update PAPER_STATUS_CHECKLIST.md with ACL readiness tracker

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
